content: You have successfully connected your domain to your IP address. To edit the space address settings, you need to set the future {{productName}} name

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message explaining that the user has successfully connected their domain and needs to set the future name of the {{productName}}. The message appears in a dialog box when creating a new space, prompting users to edit space address settings.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'To edit the space address settings' is not the best translation of 'To edit the space address settings'. A more natural phrasing in Arabic might be 'لتعديل إعدادات عنوان المساحة...' or 'لتغيير إعدادات عنوان المساحة...'
The translation lacks consistent capitalization. 'Domen' and 'IP' should likely be capitalized as they are proper nouns.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Domeninizi IP ünvanınızla uğurla əlaqələndirdiniz. Domen Ünvanı parametrlərini redaktə etmək üçün gələcək {{productName}} adını təyin etməlisiniz

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "il faut définir" is a bit stiff and less natural in this context. A more natural phrasing would be "vous devez définir" or "il est nécessaire de définir".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vous devez définir le nom du futur {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "To edit the space address settings" is a bit clunky. A more natural Japanese phrasing would be something like "スペースアドレスの設定を変更するには".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: スペースアドレスの設定を変更するには

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "you need to set the future {{productName}} name" is not the most natural way to express the meaning in Japanese. It sounds a bit robotic. It would be more natural to say something like '{{productName}}の名前を決定する必要があります' (you need to decide the {{productName}} name).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{productName}}の名前を決定する必要があります

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "space address settings" is translated as "ການຕັ້ງຄ່າທີ່ຢູ່ອາວະກາດ". While technically correct, a more natural and common phrasing in Lao for this context would be something like "ການຕັ້ງຄ່າທີ່ຢູ່ຂອງສະຖານທີ່" (the setting of the location).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "ການຕັ້ງຄ່າທີ່ຢູ່ຂອງສະຖານທີ່" instead of "ການຕັ້ງຄ່າທີ່ຢູ່ອາວະກາດ".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'space address settings' is not idiomatic Dutch. While technically correct, it's not how a native speaker would phrase it. It sounds very literal from the English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'instellingen voor het ruimteadres' or 'adresinstellingen voor uw ruimte'.  A more natural phrasing might depend on the specific meaning of 'space' in the context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The spacing after 'ruimte' and before 'adresinstellingen' feels a little unnatural in Dutch.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the space between 'ruimte' and 'adresinstellingen' for better readability: 'adresinstellingen voor uw ruimte'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "dresu obszaru" is an incorrect and unclear translation of "space address settings". It appears to be a combination of "dress" and "area", which doesn't convey the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aby móc edytować ustawienia adresu przestrzeni (or) Aby móc edytować ustawienia nazwy obszaru

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "to edit the space address settings" is translated somewhat literally as "Pentru a modifica setările pentru adresa spațiului". A more natural and idiomatic translation would be "Pentru a modifica setările adresei spațiului" or "Pentru a modifica setările legate de adresa spațiului".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pentru a modifica setările adresei spațiului

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word డొమెයින් is a Telugu word and not Sinhala. It should be 'domain'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබගේ domain සාර්ථකව ඔබේ IP ලිපිනයට සම්බන්ධ කර ඇත.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit awkward. 'අනාගත {{productName}} නම සකසීමට, ඔබට අඩවිය ලිපිනය සැකසුම් වෙනස් කිරීමට අවශ්‍යයි.' can be improved for clarity.  Specifically, the use of 'සකසීමට' and 'අඩවිය ලිපිනය සැකසුම් වෙනස් කිරීමට' is not natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: අනාගත {{productName}} නම සකසන්න, ඔබට අඩවිය ලිපිනය වෙනස් කිරීමට අවශ්‍යයි.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'අඩවිය ලිපිනය සැකසුම් වෙනස් කිරීමට' is an odd combination of words. It translates roughly to 'to change the site address settings'.  A more accurate translation of 'edit the space address settings' would require rephrasing. The intent seems to be that setting the future product name is required to edit the space/site address.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: අනාගත {{productName}} නම සකසන්න, නැතිනම් ඔබට අඩවිය ලිපිනය වෙනස් කිරීමට බැරි විය හැකියි.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'space address settings' is not naturally translated as 'nastavitve naslova prostora'. A more natural translation might be 'nastavitve naslova območja' or 'naslovna nastavitev prostora'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'space address settings' as 'nastavitve naslova območja' or 'naslovna nastavitev prostora'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "space address settings" is not accurately translated. "Адресе простора" implies a physical address rather than space configuration settings. It should be something like "подешавања простора" or "подешавања за простор".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Успешно сте повезали свој домен на вашу IP адресу. Да бисте уредили подешавања простора, потребно је да поставите будуће име {{productName}}-а

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of the genitive case "-а" on {{productName}} in the Serbian translation is potentially incorrect depending on the specific product name and the intended grammatical structure.  It needs to be reviewed within the context of the entire system.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Needs review based on the specific value of {{productName}} to ensure proper grammatical case (e.g., nominative, genitive, dative).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Da biste uredili podešavanja adrese prostora" is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be "Da biste izmenili podešavanja adrese prostora" or "Da biste podesili podešavanja adrese prostora".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Da biste izmenili podešavanja adrese prostora

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of the genitive case "{{productName}}-a" feels slightly unnatural in this context. Using the nominative case might sound better for clarity.

The phrase "không gian" (space) in "địa chỉ không gian" is not the most natural way to express "space address settings." A more accurate and common translation would be "cài đặt địa chỉ" or "thiết lập địa chỉ".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bạn đã kết nối thành công tên miền với địa chỉ IP của mình. Để chỉnh sửa cài đặt địa chỉ, bạn cần đặt tên {{productName}} trong tương lai
